views.markdown:
Requires Instagram app from the AppStore.
Compatible with iOS 8 to 12.

Rocket enriches Instagram client with loads of features! Starting from saving posts, reposting, checking if other users follow you and many more.

Feed Enhancements
- Download posts (Videos and Photos)
- Repost posts (Videos and Photos)
- Long press on posts to zoom
- Copy text captions from posts

Stories
- Save stories to Camera Roll
- View stories anonymously
- Manually mark stories as seen
- Mute and unmute video stories
- Upload from Camera Roll (Swipe up)
- Disable auto switch between stories
- Hide stories bar from feed

Profile
- Show if other users follow you
- Long press on profile image to zoom
- Show exact value of numerical stats

Direct Messages
- Disable read receipts
- Save messaged stories to Camera Roll
- Disable screenshot detection in stories

Spoofing (Local Only)
- Verify your profile
- Followers count
- Following count
- Uploads count

- Added compatibility for Instagram v118.0 - Added compatibility for iOS 13.
- Fixed grid feed not loading posts.
- Fixed Stories not showing in grid feed.
- Fixed Disable Refresh option.
- Fixed downloader not working in some cases.
Version 3.3.1
- Fixed crash when tapping on 'Watch All' in stories
- Fixed friendship status not showing on IG v84.0+
- Fixed zooming on profile pictures not working sometimes
- Fixed layout on some newer devices
- Added button to deactivate Rocket Pro in tweak settings
Version 1.4.9:
- Fixed crash when saving stories on IG 10.14


Version 1.4.8:
- Added support for Instagram 10.14.
Version 1.4.6:
- Added support for downloading multiple-photos posts
- Fixed zomming on profile pictures
- Fixed ads showing for Pro users
- Fixed friendship status not showing in IG 10.12
Version 1.4.5:
- Fixed crash when viewing profiles on Instagram 10.11
Version 1.4.4:
- Fixed Rocket Pro activation.
- Fixed 3D touch crash in grid mode.
Version 1.4.3:
- Fixed preferences crash


Version 1.4.2:
- Fixed force touch crash on grid feed items.


Version 1.4.0:
- Added ability to disable refresh on cold boot.
Version 1.3.9:
- Updated for Instagram 10.4.
- Fixed a bug related to stories in grid view.
Version 1.3.8:
- Updated for Instagram 10.3.0.
Version 1.3.7:
- Compatibility with Instagram 10.1.
- Fixed a visual bug related to Rocket Pro.
Version 1.3.6:
- Fixed crashes on latest Instagram
- Added download button to direct messages stories.
- Added option to manually mark direct messages stories as seen.
- Added option to disable screenshot detection on direct messages stories.


Version 1.3.5:
- UI improvements.
- Compatibility with Instagram 10.0.
- Fixed a bug related to Rocket Pro.
Version 1.3.4:
- Fixed: Crash when reposting posts on Instagram 9.7.
- Fixed: Viewing posts in grid feed on Instagram 9.7.
- Other minor bug fixes and improvements.


Version 1.3.3:
- Added: Option to disable stories auto switch to next friend.
- Fixed: While viewing a profile picture, the app will show a cached version of the image.
- Fixed: Crash while viewing stories on Instagram 9.7.
Version 1.3.2:
- Updated for latest Instagram update.
Version 1.3.1:
- New: 3D Touch support for gird home feed.
- New: Ability to mute video sound in stories.
- Fixed: Following status not appearing in some profiles.
- Fixed: Other minor bugs were squashed.


Version 1.2.5:
- Improved images loading mechanism in the grid feed.
- Fixed a bug that double zoomed on profile pictures.
- Fixed a reported random crash.

Version 1.2.4:
- Fixed crash when refreshing grid feed.
- Fixed a bug that made the grid feed non refreshable.

Version 1.2.3:
- Fixed HOPP'N compatibility.
- Added compatibility for Instagram 9.3.

Version 1.2.2:
- Added ability to add unlimited Instagram accounts.
- Added “Copy caption text” option.
- Fixed a rare crash that occurred in the preferences.
- Fixed story saving on Instagram 9.2.0.
- Fixed grid feed layout on Instagram 9.2.0.
Version 1.2.1:
- Added new heavily customizable gird feed layout.
- Added option to auto play sounds with videos without tapping screen.
- Added option to disable stories view from feed.
- Skipping a story no longer mark it as skipped unless done manually.
- Added option to auto play videos with sound by default.
- Added option to change date format for posts in your feed.
- Changing spoofing settings no longer requires an app restart.
- Fixed a crash that occurred when viewing the video at top of Explore feed.
- Fixed connectivity problems with Rocket Hub.

Version 1.2.0:
- Added option to download videos and photos from stories.
- Added option to view stories without marking them as seen.
- Added option to manually mark stories as seen.
- Added option to show the entire gallery in story maker.
- Fixed zooming on profile picture in user details screen.
- Fixed muted users list not appearing in Rocket settings.
Version 1.1.8:
- Added compatibility for Instagram v9.0.0.
Version 1.1.7:
- Support for latest Instagram update.
Version 1.1.6:
- Added compatibility for latest Instagram update.
Version 1.1.5:
- Fixed reposting on latest Instagram update.
- Fixed saving posts on latest Instagram update.
- Fixed users muting on latest Instagram update.
- Fixed Hub on latest Instagram update.
- Other bug fixes.

Version 1.1.4:
- Greatly improved hub and promo visibility.
- Updated hub, reposting and friendship status for latest Instagram update.
- Other minor bug fixes and improvements.
Version 1.1.3:
- Fixed a crash on old versions of iOS.

Version 1.1.2:
- New: Show full followers/following count in user profiles. (12,000 instead of 12k)
- Squashed a few tiny bugs.
- Added compatibility with Instagram 8.0.
- New revamped hub to help you promote your media and get more likes.
- Changed likes per coins ratio to 1:1 for a better experience.
- Fixed a crash when attempting to repost media on latest Instagram update. Version 1.0.3:
- Added option to disable Hub.
- Added iOS 7 support.
- Fixed slow startup time.
